//# sourceMappingURL=mpulse.min.js.map</script>

href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/cookie-policy/">Cookie Policy</a></li><li><a href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/terms-conditions/">Terms and Conditions</a></li><li><a href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/subscriptions/">Paper Subscription to the Daily Mirror</a></li><li><a href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/subscriptions/">Paper Subscription to the Sunday Mirror</a></li><li><a href="http://www.irishmirror.ie/">Irish Mirror</a></li><li><a href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/">© 2017 MGN Limited</a></li></ul></section></nav></header>
<main>
<nav class="breadcrumbs" xmlns:vocabulary="http://rdf.data-vocabulary.org/#"><ol><li class="publication-theme-border" typeof="vocabulary:Breadcrumb"><a class="publication-theme-highlight publication-theme-icon" href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/" rel="vocabulary:url" property="vocabulary:title">Home</a></li><li class="publication-theme-border" typeof="vocabulary:Breadcrumb"><a href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/" rel="vocabulary:url" property="vocabulary:title">News</a></li><li class="publication-theme-border" typeof="vocabulary:Breadcrumb"><a href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/world-news/" rel="vocabulary:url" property="vocabulary:title">World news</a></li><li class="publication-theme-border" typeof="vocabulary:Breadcrumb"><a href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/all-about/tattoos" rel="vocabulary:url" property="vocabulary:title">Tattoos</a></li></ol></nav>
<div itemprop="publisher" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/NewsMediaOrganization"><meta itemprop="name" content="mirror"/><meta itemprop="url" content="http://www.mirror.co.uk/"/><div itemprop="logo" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/ImageObject"><meta itemprop="url" content="https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/trinity-images/logos/mirror.png"/><meta itemprop="width" content="219"/><meta itemprop="height" content="60"/></div></div><meta itemprop="mainEntityOfPage" content="http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/world-news/wifes-fury-after-drunken-brit-11392543"/><article class="article-main channel-news" data-mod="articleSso" data-url="http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/world-news/wifes-fury-after-drunken-brit-11392543"><div class="article-type publication-font"><a class="channel-name section-theme-highlight" href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/">News</a></div><h1 class="section-theme-background-indicator publication-font" itemprop="headline name">Wife's fury after drunken Brit husband gets huge Chinese tattoo inked across forehead to express his love</h1><p itemprop="description">The expat living in Taiwan also got the Taiwan independence flag tattooed on his chin, much to his other half's dismay</p><div class="byline"><div class="sharebar" data-share-image="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11392602.ece/ALTERNATES/s1200/PAY-AsiaWire-TattooRegret-01.jpg" hidden">&nbsp;</span><span class="count-text initial">Comments</span></a></li></ul></div><div itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/Person"><meta itemprop="name" content="Scott Feng"/></div><div class="article-information" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-10-23T09:03:08Z"><div class="author-information-container"><div class="author"><span rel="author">Scott Feng</span></div></div><ul class="time-info"><li><time class="date-published" datetime="2017-10-23T09:03:08Z"></time>10:03, 23 OCT 2017</li><li><span>Updated</span><time class="date-updated" itemprop="dateModified" content="2017-10-23T12:24:12Z" datetime="2017-10-23T12:24:12Z"></time>13:24, 23 OCT 2017</li></ul></div><div class="article-type publication-font"><a class="channel-name section-theme-highlight" href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/">News</a></div></div><div class="article-wrapper"><div class="content-column"><figure class="in-article-image lead-article-image" itemprop="image" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/ImageObject"><meta itemprop="url" content="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11392600.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/PAY-AsiaWire-TattooRegret-03.jpg"/><meta itemprop="width" content="615"/><meta itemprop="height" content="409"/><img srcset="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11392600.ece/ALTERNATES/s508/PAY-AsiaWire-TattooRegret-03.jpg 508w, that have left his wife angry</span><span class="credit" itemprop="author"> (Image: AsiaWire)</span></figcaption></figure><div class="byline side-sharebar"><div class="sharebar" data-share-image="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11392602.ece/ALTERNATES/s1200/PAY-AsiaWire-TattooRegret-01.jpg" tattooed on his chin, much to his other half's dismay" data-content-image="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11392602.ece/ALTERNATES/s1200/PAY-AsiaWire-TattooRegret-01.jpg" tattooed on his chin, much to his other half's dismay" data-content-image="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11392602.ece/ALTERNATES/s1200/PAY-AsiaWire-TattooRegret-01.jpg" data-tracking="whatsapp|share|side"></a></li><li class="count-shares"><span class="count-num hidden">&nbsp;</span><span class="count-text initial">Share</span></li><li class="sharebar-comments"><a class="sharebar-icon icon comments" href="#comments-section" title="Comments"></a></li><li class="count-comments"><a href="#comments-section" title="Comments"><span class="count-num hidden">&nbsp;</span><span class="count-text initial">Comments</span></a></li></ul></div></div><div class="article-body" itemprop="articleBody"><form class="skinny-signup skinny-signup-top publication-theme-border" data-mod="skinnySignup" data-json="{&quot;mailingListId&quot;:&quot;55334&quot;,&quot;displayName&quot;:&quot;daily&quot;,&quot;contentId&quot;:6314564,&quot;endpointUrl&quot;:&quot;https://comm-proxy.tm-awx.com/api/publications/mirror/subscriptions/&quot;}"><span class="skinny-header">Get <strong class="name">daily</strong> updates directly to your <strong>inbox</strong></span><div class="skinny-form"><input type="text" placeholder="Enter your email"/><button class="publication-theme-button" type="submit">+ Subscribe</button><div class="confirm"><span>Thank you for subscribing!</span></div><span class="warning">Could not subscribe, try again later</span><span class="invalid">Invalid Email</span></div></form><p>A British expat living in Taiwan angered his wife when he made the drunken decision to <a data-action="tattoos" data-content-type="section-topic" data-track="false" data-type="inline" data-word-count="1" href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/all-about/tattoos">tattoo</a> the island's name on his forehead in huge Chinese characters.</p> <p>Paul, 32, admits he would have not gone through with it had he not been drunk.</p> <p>Doctors in Taiwan said it may take 10 painful sessions and 200,000 TWD (&pound;5,000) to have the tattoo lightened via laser treatment, and it will take much more than that to have it fully removed.</p> <p>Paul is said to be an avid supporter of Taiwan's sovereignty and independence movement.</p> <p>But he shocked his Taiwanese wife when he came home with the words &quot;tai wan&quot; inked on his head and a Taiwan independence flag tattooed on his chin.</p> <p>The Brit, who met his wife during a working-holiday trip in Australia in the mid-2000s, has been living in Taiwan for over a decade and now lives in the south-western city of Kaohsiung.</p> <figure class="in-article-image" data-mod="image" itemprop="image" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/ImageObject">
<meta itemprop="url" content="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11392602.ece/ALTERNATES/s615b/PAY-AsiaWire-TattooRegret-01.jpg" />
<meta itemprop="width" content="615" />
<meta itemprop="height" content="818" />
<div class="outer">
<div class="spacer" style="padding-top:133.01%;"></div>
<div class="mod-image">
<img data-src="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11392602.ece/ALTERNATES/s615b/PAY-AsiaWire-TattooRegret-01.jpg" alt="" content="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11392602.ece/ALTERNATES/s615b/PAY-AsiaWire-TattooRegret-01.jpg" />
</div>
</div>
<figcaption>
<span class="caption" itemprop="description">Paul admits he wouldn't have got the new tattoo if he wasn't drunk at the time</span>
<span class="credit" itemprop="author"> (Image: AsiaWire)</span>
</figcaption>
</figure> <div class="mod-video" data-mod="video" data-placeholder="data-placeholder">
<div class="video-wrapper">
<div class="video-preloader">

</noscript>
</div>

supporters celebrate official presidential e&quot;,&quot;articleTypeName&quot;:&quot;brightcoveVideo&quot;,&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/video/weah-supporters-celebrate-official-presidential-11416486&quot;,&quot;articleUrl&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11416485.ece/ALTERNATES/s405v/Sequence-105Still001.jpg&quot;,&quot;duration&quot;:59,&quot;videoId&quot;:&quot;5626194104001&quot;,&quot;isVideoRelation&quot;:false},{&quot;id&quot;:11416343,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Kids on roof spooked by nearby hostage situation&quot;,&quot;articleTypeName&quot;:&quot;brightcoveVideo&quot;,&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/video/kids-roof-spooked-nearby-hostage-11416343&quot;,&quot;articleUrl&quot;:&quot;http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/world-news/freerunners-hoodies-filmed-hiding-roof-11416405&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;https://bcsecure01-a.akamaihd.net/24/4221396001/201710/484/4221396001_5626145339001_5626133963001-vs.jpg?pubId=4221396001&amp;videoId=5626133963001&quot;,&quot;duration&quot;:41,&quot;videoId&quot;:&quot;5626133963001&quot;,&quot;isVideoRelation&quot;:false},{&quot;id&quot;:11416250,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Dog with the ability to open doors&quot;,&quot;articleTypeName&quot;:&quot;brightcoveVideo&quot;,&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/video/dog-ability-open-doors-11416250&quot;,&quot;articleUrl&quot;:&quot;http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/dog-can-open-doors-almost-11416398&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;https://bcsecure01-a.akamaihd.net/24/4221396001/201710/3836/4221396001_5625732439001_5625728092001-vs.jpg?pubId=4221396001&amp;videoId=5625728092001&quot;,&quot;duration&quot;:8,&quot;videoId&quot;:&quot;5625728092001&quot;,&quot;isVideoRelation&quot;:false},{&quot;id&quot;:11416155,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;POLICE TELL GUNMAN TO PUT WEAPONS DOWN DURING HOS&quot;,&quot;articleTypeName&quot;:&quot;brightcoveVideo&quot;,&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/video/police-tell-gunman-put-weapons-11416155&quot;,&quot;articleUrl&quot;:&quot;http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/world-news/gunman-takes-multiple-people-hostage-11416110&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11416152.ece/ALTERNATES/s405v/Sequence-103Still001.jpg&quot;,&quot;duration&quot;:13,&quot;videoId&quot;:&quot;5626105316001&quot;,&quot;isVideoRelation&quot;:false},{&quot;id&quot;:11416119,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Gunman 'takes multiple people hostage' inside Tor&quot;,&quot;articleTypeName&quot;:&quot;brightcoveVideo&quot;,&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/video/gunman-takes-multiple-people-hostage-11416119&quot;,&quot;articleUrl&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;https://bcsecure01-a.akamaihd.net/24/4221396001/201710/2724/4221396001_5626094297001_5626067336001-vs.jpg?pubId=4221396001&amp;videoId=5626067336001&quot;,&quot;duration&quot;:17,&quot;videoId&quot;:&quot;5626067336001&quot;,&quot;isVideoRelation&quot;:false},{&quot;id&quot;:11416077,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Russia 'test fires Intercontinental Balistic Miss&quot;,&quot;articleTypeName&quot;:&quot;brightcoveVideo&quot;,&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/video/russia-test-fires-intercontinental-balistic-11416077&quot;,&quot;articleUrl&quot;:&quot;http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/world-news/russia-test-fires-ballistic-missile-11416060&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11416080.ece/ALTERNATES/s405v/VIDEO-RUSSIA.jpg&quot;,&quot;duration&quot;:97,&quot;videoId&quot;:&quot;5626077743001&quot;,&quot;isVideoRelation&quot;:false},{&quot;id&quot;:11416067,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;DEVASTATION LEFT BEHIND AFTER CAR PLOUGHS INTO A &quot;,&quot;articleTypeName&quot;:&quot;brightcoveVideo&quot;,&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/video/devastation-left-behind-after-car-11416067&quot;,&quot;articleUrl&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11416065.ece/ALTERNATES/s405v/BAR.jpg&quot;,&quot;duration&quot;:88,&quot;videoId&quot;:&quot;5626067262001&quot;,&quot;isVideoRelation&quot;:false},{&quot;id&quot;:11415977,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Shocking moment car ploughs into busy bar&quot;,&quot;articleTypeName&quot;:&quot;brightcoveVideo&quot;,&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/video/shocking-moment-car-ploughs-busy-11415977&quot;,&quot;articleUrl&quot;:&quot;http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/world-news/cctv-shows-out-control-car-11416599&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11415968.ece/ALTERNATES/s405v/Sequence-101Still001.jpg&quot;,&quot;duration&quot;:38,&quot;videoId&quot;:&quot;5626045254001&quot;,&quot;isVideoRelation&quot;:false}]}}"></div>
</div> <aside class="read-more-links">
<h5 class="publication-theme-icon publication-theme-border">Read More</h5>
<ul>
<li><a href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/star-wars-fan-dwarfism-ties-11362161">Star Wars fan with dwarfism ties knot in Hobbit house after finding love thanks to his Yoda tattoo</a></li>
</ul>
</aside> <p>He even had the same green, alternative Taiwan independence flag - made by the World Taiwanese Congress - tattooed on his right arm a year ago.</p> <p>By Paul's own admission, the rash decision to ink the name of Taiwan on his forehead came during a night of heavy drinking and after a passionate discussion about Taiwan's independence.</p> <p>He is said to have picked out the nearest tattoo parlour and then demanded the words and green flag be inked on his face.</p> <p>Tattoo artist Wei Cheng, who has been accused of taking advantage of his drunk client, argues that he questioned Paul's decision numerous times before proceeding with the session.</p> <p>&quot;Are you sure you want to tattoo this on your face?&quot; Wei said he asked Paul, who replied: &quot;I love Taiwan. Tattoo it on my face.&quot;</p> <figure class="in-article-image" data-mod="image" itemprop="image" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/ImageObject">
<meta itemprop="url" content="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11392603.ece/ALTERNATES/s615b/PAY-AsiaWire-TattooRegret-07.jpg" />
<meta itemprop="width" content="615" />
<meta itemprop="height" content="818" />
<div class="outer">
<div class="spacer" style="padding-top:133.01%;"></div>
<div class="mod-image">
<img data-src="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11392603.ece/ALTERNATES/s615b/PAY-AsiaWire-TattooRegret-07.jpg" alt="" content="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11392603.ece/ALTERNATES/s615b/PAY-AsiaWire-TattooRegret-07.jpg" />
</div>
</div>
<figcaption>
<span class="caption" itemprop="description">Paul's dragon tattoo on his back</span>
<span class="credit" itemprop="author"> (Image: AsiaWire)</span>
</figcaption>
</figure> <aside class="read-more-links">
<h5 class="publication-theme-icon publication-theme-border">Read More</h5>
<ul>
<li><a href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/tv/tv-news/tattoo-addict-who-spent-15000-11336728">Tattoo addict who has spent &pound;15,000 gets This Morning inkings on air before revealing lighthouse on his penis</a></li>
</ul>
</aside> <p>Wei said: &quot;I told him he could even be pulled over by the police, but he said he would change his passport photo.&quot;</p> <p>Wei noted that his enthusiastic client even shaved his beard himself before the session and was &quot;very pleased&quot; with the end result, uploading photos of his new tattoo online.</p> <p>The Brit's wife, however, was not pleased with the &quot;artwork&quot;.</p> <figure class="in-article-image" data-mod="image" itemprop="image" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/ImageObject">
<meta itemprop="url" content="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11392604.ece/ALTERNATES/s615b/PAY-AsiaWire-TattooRegret-06.jpg" />
<meta itemprop="width" content="615" />
<meta itemprop="height" content="786" />
<div class="outer">
<div class="spacer" style="padding-top:127.80%;"></div>
<div class="mod-image">
<img data-src="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11392604.ece/ALTERNATES/s615b/PAY-AsiaWire-TattooRegret-06.jpg" alt="" content="https://i2-prod.mirror.co.uk/incoming/article11392604.ece/ALTERNATES/s615b/PAY-AsiaWire-TattooRegret-06.jpg" />
</div>
</div>
<figcaption>
<span class="caption" itemprop="description">Tattoo artist Wei Cheng</span>
<span class="credit" itemprop="author"> (Image: AsiaWire)</span>
</figcaption>
</figure> <p>&quot;My wife doesn't like it. She's very angry,&quot; Paul told local media.</p> <p>&quot;I'm stupid,&quot; he added.</p> <p>&quot;I love Taiwan. That's why I did this,&quot; Paul said, adding: &quot;But I wouldn't have done this had I not been drunk.&quot;</p> <p>When asked what he plans to do about the tattoo, he said: &quot;I don't know.&quot;</p></div><div id="social-follow" data-mod="socialFollow"><ul id="social-headings"><li>Like us on <strong>Facebook</strong></li><li>Follow us on <strong>Twitter</strong></li><li>Daily href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/google-survey/">Google Survey</a></li><li><a href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/privacy-statement/">Privacy Statement</a></li><li><a href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/cookie-policy/">Cookie Policy</a></li><li><a href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/terms-conditions/">Terms and Conditions</a></li><li><a href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/subscriptions/">Paper Subscription to the Daily Mirror</a></li><li><a href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/subscriptions/">Paper Subscription to the Sunday Mirror</a></li><li><a href="http://www.irishmirror.ie/">Irish Mirror</a></li><li><a href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/">© 2017 MGN Limited</a></li><li></li></ul></footer>
<div class="mod-cookiepolicy publication-theme-border" data-mod="cookiepolicy" data-immediate><div class="inner"><span>This website uses cookies. Using this website means you are okay with this but you can find out more and learn how to manage your cookie choices <a class="send-event" id="agree-policy" target="_blank" href="http://www.mirror.co.uk/cookie-policy/">here</a>.</span><a class="close icon send-event" href="#close-overlay">Close cookie policy overlay</a></div></div>
<div id="bottom-article-message"></div>
<style>
#bottom-article-message {
bottom: 0;
left: 0;
position: fixed;
transition: opacity .5s;
width: 100% !important;
z-index: 3
}
.active+#bottom-article-message, .active+div[class*="mod-"]:not(.active)+#bottom-article-message {
bottom: 80px
}
@media all and (min-width: 728px) {
.active+#bottom-article-message, .active+div[class*="mod-"]:not(.active)+#bottom-article-message {
bottom: 70px
}
}
@media all and (min-width: 1240px) {
.active+#bottom-article-message, .active+div[class*="mod-"]:not(.active)+#bottom-article-message {
bottom: 60px
}
}
.active+.active+#bottom-article-message {
bottom: 160px
}
@media all and (min-width: 728px) {
.active+.active+#bottom-article-message {
bottom: 120px
}
}
@media all and (min-width: 1240px) {
.active+.active+#bottom-article-message {
bottom: 110px
}
}
